about_the_game:
Harpy is a "Foddian" game, a difficult platformer with a simple and unique movement system. Climb a spire of floating islands, trek four different levels with fresh challenges and hazards, and try not to fall all the way down.

Explore a basic area to really feel the movement, a mushroom zone with moving platforms, a cloud section with fading blocks and timing challenges, and then finally the temples, with lightning on top of everything you've seen before.
This game also features numerous easter eggs to bring different platforming challenges to the table, keeping the game fresh and replayable.

Do you have what it takes to master Harpy and speedrun the game? I'll warn you, it isn't easy.
